description: Coral showed weakness during her first day about her self esteem. We want strong slaves, so she is put through a long day of sadistic humiliation to show her that her physical being is only that, and she has to find a way to push through. She is made to endure constant degradation to push her through this hang up she has with beating herself up mentally. Later she endures strenuous torment and we make her orgasm during the pain.
title: Training Coral Aorta - Day 2 "Humility"
